original_text: He was with David at Pas-dammim when the Philistines were gathered there for battle. There was a plot of ground full of barley, and the men fled from the Philistines.
korean_text: 그가 바스담밈에서 다윗과 함께 있었더니 블레셋 사람들이 그 곳에 모여와서 치니 거기에 보리가 많이 난 밭이 있더라 백성들이 블레셋 사람들 앞에서 도망하되

sentences.original_text: He was with David at Pas-dammim
when the Philistines were gathered there for battle.
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람들이 그곳에서 싸우려고 모여 있었을 때

sentences.original_text: There was a plot of ground full of barley,
and the men fled from the Philistines.
